dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, so did you see this news about the President getting a briefing on Tenge Bank?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, so did you see this news about the President getting a briefing on Tenge Bank?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I did! Pretty interesting, especially with their, like, proposals for new services aimed at helping bigger companies, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I did! Pretty interesting, especially with their, like, proposals for new services aimed at helping bigger companies, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And, uh, it really highlights how widespread they are already. I mean, 600,000 domestic entrepreneurs using their tech? That's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And, uh, it really highlights how widespread they are already. I mean, six hundred thousand domestic entrepreneurs using their tech? That's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information presented to the Head of State, today about 700 thousand domestic entrepreneurs are developing their businesses using technologies from Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really is. And the numbers for just the first half of this year are kinda mind-blowing. Like, 10 trillion tenge in cash payments alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really is. And the numbers for just the first half of this year are kinda mind-blowing. Like, ten trillion tenge in cash payments alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Right? And then on top of that, 100,000 new individual entrepreneurs registered. That's, um, quite a boom in just six months.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then on top of that, one hundred thousand new individual entrepreneurs registered. That's, um, quite a boom in just six months.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024... 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really shows the growth. And I was also impressed by the online salary services they developed jointly with the government departments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really shows the growth. And I was also impressed by the online salary services they developed jointly with the government departments.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can pay taxes on time using online services created jointly between Kaspi.kz and the relevant government departments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Making it easier for businesses to, you know, pay salaries on time. Over 900 billion tenge processed that way in six months is no joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Making it easier for businesses to, you know, pay salaries on time. Over nine hundred billion tenge processed that way in six months is no joke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely not. But then the President, uh, specifically noted the importance of *further* assistance to large enterprises.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely not. But then the President, uh, specifically noted the importance of further assistance to large enterprises.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's where it gets interesting, because he then expressed "concerns" to the shareholders of Tenge Bank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's where it gets interesting, because he then expressed concerns to the shareholders of Tenge Bank.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Concerns"? Like, what do you think that means? Is he, um, unhappy, or is it more of a push?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Concerns? Like, what do you think that means? Is he, um, unhappy, or is it more of a push?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I read it more as a push, you know? Like, "you're doing great, but we need you to do even *more* for the big players."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I read it more as a push, you know? Like, you're doing great, but we need you to do even more for the big players.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, yeah, that makes sense. Like, don't just focus on the small guys; the big ones need innovation and support too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, yeah, that makes sense. Like, don't just focus on the small guys; the big ones need innovation and support too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Keep that momentum going.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Keep that momentum going.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a clear message then, for Tenge Bank to, like, keep stepping up their game across the board.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a clear message then, for Tenge Bank to, like, keep stepping up their game across the board.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz...
